example.description: A mind-bending thriller where dream invasion is possible.

allOf.example:
<MovieDto>
  <movieId>2</movieId>
  <title>Inception</title>
  <duration>148</duration>
  <ageRating>NINE</ageRating>
  <contentClassification>
    <contentClassification>VIOLENCE</contentClassification>
    <contentClassification>TERROR</contentClassification>
  </contentClassification>
  <genre>ACTION</genre>
  <description>A mind-bending thriller where dream invasion is possible.</description>
  <releaseDate>2010</releaseDate>
  <releaseDate>7</releaseDate>
  <releaseDate>16</releaseDate>
  <availableQualities>
    <availableQualities>UHD</availableQualities>
    <availableQualities>HD</availableQualities>
  </availableQualities>
  <director>Christopher Nolan</director>
  <actors>
    <actors>Leonardo DiCaprio</actors>
    <actors>Joseph Gordon-Levitt</actors>
    <actors>Ellen Page</actors>
  </actors>
</MovieDto>

application/xml;charset=UTF-8.example:
<MovieDto>
  <movieId>2</movieId>
  <title>Inception</title>
  <duration>148</duration>
  <ageRating>NINE</ageRating>
  <contentClassification>
    <contentClassification>VIOLENCE</contentClassification>
    <contentClassification>TERROR</contentClassification>
  </contentClassification>
  <genre>ACTION</genre>
  <description>A mind-bending thriller where dream invasion is possible.</description>
  <releaseDate>2010</releaseDate>
  <releaseDate>7</releaseDate>
  <releaseDate>16</releaseDate>
  <availableQualities>
    <availableQualities>UHD</availableQualities>
    <availableQualities>HD</availableQualities>
  </availableQualities>
  <director>Christopher Nolan</director>
  <actors>
    <actors>Leonardo DiCaprio</actors>
    <actors>Joseph Gordon-Levitt</actors>
    <actors>Ellen Page</actors>
  </actors>
</MovieDto>

allOf.example:
<ArrayList>
  <item>
    <seriesId>4</seriesId>
    <totalSeasons>3</totalSeasons>
    <currentSeason>Season 3</currentSeason>
    <title>My Awesome Series</title>
    <episodes>
      <episodes>
        <episodeId>1</episodeId>
        <episodeNumber>5</episodeNumber>
        <seasonNumber>2</seasonNumber>
        <duration>42</duration>
        <title>The Great Reveal</title>
        <description>The season's biggest secret is finally unveiled.</description>
        <releaseDate>2024</releaseDate>
        <releaseDate>5</releaseDate>
        <releaseDate>15</releaseDate>
      </episodes>
    </episodes>
  </item>
</ArrayList>

application/xml;charset=UTF-8.example:
<ArrayList>
  <item>
    <seriesId>4</seriesId>
    <totalSeasons>3</totalSeasons>
    <currentSeason>Season 3</currentSeason>
    <title>My Awesome Series</title>
    <episodes>
      <episodes>
        <episodeId>1</episodeId>
        <episodeNumber>5</episodeNumber>
        <seasonNumber>2</seasonNumber>
        <duration>42</duration>
        <title>The Great Reveal</title>
        <description>The season's biggest secret is finally unveiled.</description>
        <releaseDate>2024</releaseDate>
        <releaseDate>5</releaseDate>
        <releaseDate>15</releaseDate>
      </episodes>
    </episodes>
  </item>
</ArrayList>
